xmlquery.searchEmployeeEduLike: Select * from smhris_employee_edu where schoolName like ?
xmlquery.employeeEduDelete: Delete from smhris_employee_edu where idEmployeeEdu = ? and idEmployee = ?
xmlquery.employeeEduEdit: Update smhris_employee_edu set schoolName=?, institution=?, description=?, yearFrom=?, yearTo=? where idEmployee=? and idEmployeeEdu=?
